doc:
Béatrice Romand https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/B%C3%A9atrice_Romand 0 Béatrice Romand (born 1952, Birkhadem, French Algeria) is a French actress. She is best known for her work with director Éric Rohmer in such films as Claire's Knee, Chloe in the Afternoon, A Good Marriage, Le Rayon vert and Autumn Tale. She also appeared on television in Graf Yoster gibt sich die Ehre, a German detective show. Béatrice_Romand ( born 1952 , Birkhadem , French_Algeria ) is a_French_actress . She is_best_known for her_work with director_Éric_Rohmer in such_films as Claire 's_Knee , Chloe in the_Afternoon , A_Good_Marriage , Le_Rayon_vert_and_Autumn_Tale . She also appeared on television in Graf_Yoster_gibt_sich die Ehre , a_German_detective_show .
